resources.string: Cynosure is a multifaceted technical fest organized to bring out the real talent.This takes you into a whole new world combined with excited events,flawless creative designs tantalizing quizzes and feet tapping brain teasers .The whole technological ride promises you an awesome experience which is going to be now or never and leaves an impression in your minds .So come join us and have fun filled with great enthusiasm.For fun events like meme ,photo contest send your pic to facebook page mentioned below
CAPER WITH CIPHER is an event to test your knowledge and wisdom on cryptography. It deals with decrypting CIPHER TEXT into PLAIN TEXT in different ways

We must bring you to the event Tech Tambola. Here is an exciting event but with a technical TAMBOLA !! Guess and strike QUESTION number you sliced in the Tambola slips . The team has to claim after getting the given pattern in their tambola slips will be winner. Pray your luck to be with you.
A general quiz oriented towards knowledge on the field of Computer science. Participants are required to compete in a number of rounds testing their knowledge in all aspects of Computer science.
This quiz purely tests your general knowledge comprising of questions from various areas like History,Geography,Mythology,Current affairs etc…

The Query Cracker event at CYNOSURE2020 aims to provide the best platform to expose your skills in DBMS.This event is for geeks,who would like to explore the Data Base world It primarily focuses on the contender talent and ability towards Database Management

This event at Cynosure aims to provide the best platform to showcase your research ideas.If you have carried out any research on the below mentioned topics,we would be more than happy to hear your ideas out.Prepare a presentation and unleash the speaker in you to grab some exciting prizes!

A Mock interview will not only help you to perfect your technical skills , but also allow you to get valuable feedback on your performance so that you can ace it when you really face an interview. The job\'s struggles are real in today’s competitive world. Can you make it to the top ?The event Praxis Placement consists of 3 rounds where participants are shortlisted from each round.
